model.classes

Class OnTheTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.OnTheTrack

  • public class OnTheTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    CS252 Object-Oriented Programming
    OnTheTrack Class. Train wagons we have on our tracks. These cards can be used to buy Destination Cards.
    Author:
    George Kokiadis csd3962@csd.uoc.gr

    • Method Detail

      • buyDestinationCard

        public void buyDestinationCard(DestinationCard destination)
                        throws NotEnoughCardsException
        Trys to buy the selected DestinationCard. If the purchase is successful, The cards are disposed of, and the counter of the displayed city is incremented in the player.
        Parameters:
        destination - Destination Card to be bought
        Throws:
        NotEnoughCardsException - Thrown when not enough cards are in the player's hand
